title: Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18: Supply
description: The Northern Ireland Housing Statistics report is an annual compendium of statistics containing information on a range of areas relating to housing. The report is divided into sections covering: Supply..
datasetNotes: Data on this page identified as an Excel file entitled "Northern Ireland Housing Statistics 2017-18 Section 1 Tables - Supply" under heading "Documents".
sizingNotes: Compendia of 15 tables.  Needs some up front effort to define how many datasets and demnsions
notes: SOURCE: NISRA, DfC, LPS, District Council Building Control via LPS, ONS, DCLG, CSO and DECLD
